info.title: Wikibase REST API
info.description: OpenAPI definition of Wikibase REST API

contact.name: Wikimedia Deutschland - Wikibase Product Platform Team

info.title: Wikibase REST API
info.description: OpenAPI definition of Wikibase REST API

get.summary: Retrieve the map of property data types to value types

200.description: The map of property data types to value types

get.summary: Retrieve a single Wikibase Item by ID

patch.summary: Change a single Wikibase Item by ID

get.summary: Retrieve a single Wikibase Property by ID

patch.summary: Change a single Wikibase Property by ID

requestBody.description: Payload containing a JSON Patch document to be applied to an Item's descriptions and, optionally, edit metadata
Payload containing a JSON Patch document to be applied to a Property's descriptions and, optionally, edit metadata

get.summary: Retrieve an Item's description in a specific language

put.summary: Add / Replace an Item's description in a specific language

200.description: The updated Description in a specific language

201.description: The newly added Description in a specific language

delete.summary: Delete an Item's description in a specific language

get.summary: Retrieve a Property's description in a specific language

put.summary: Add / Replace a Property's description in a specific language

200.description: The updated Description in a specific language

201.description: The newly added Description in a specific language

delete.summary: Delete a Property's description in a specific language

post.summary: Add a new Statement to an Item

get.summary: Retrieve a single Statement from an Item
get.description: This endpoint is also accessible through `/statements/{statement_id}`

put.summary: Replace a single Statement of an Item
put.description: This endpoint is also accessible through `/statements/{statement_id}`

patch.summary: Change elements of a single Statement of an Item
patch.description: This endpoint is also accessible through `/statements/{statement_id}`.

delete.summary: Delete a single Statement from an Item
delete.description: This endpoint is also accessible through `/statements/{statement_id}`

get.summary: Retrieve an Item's label in a specific language

put.summary: Add / Replace an Item's label in a specific language

200.description: The updated Label in a specific language

201.description: The newly added Label in a specific language

delete.summary: Delete an Item's label in a specific language

get.summary: Retrieve a Property's label in a specific language

put.summary: Add / Replace a Property's label in a specific language

200.description: The updated Label in a specific language

201.description: The newly added Label in a specific language

delete.summary: Delete a Property's label in a specific language

get.summary: Retrieve an Item's aliases in a specific language

post.summary: Create / Add an Item's aliases in a specific language

200.description: The updated list of Aliases in a specific language

201.description: The newly created List of Aliases in a specific language

get.summary: Retrieve a Property's aliases in a specific language

post.summary: Create / Add a Property's aliases in a specific language

200.description: The updated list of Aliases in a specific language

201.description: The newly created List of Aliases in a specific language

post.summary: Add a new Statement to a Property

get.summary: Retrieve a single Statement from a Property
get.description: This endpoint is also accessible through `/statements/{statement_id}`

put.summary: Replace a single Statement of a Property
put.description: This endpoint is also accessible through `/statements/{statement_id}`

patch.summary: Change elements of a single Statement of a Property
patch.description: This endpoint is also accessible through `/statements/{statement_id}`.

delete.summary: Delete a single Statement from a Property
delete.description: This endpoint is also accessible through `/statements/{statement_id}`.

get.description: This endpoint is also accessible through `/entities/items/{item_id}/statements/{statement_id}` and `/entities/properties/{property_id}/statements/{statement_id}`

put.description: This endpoint is also accessible through `/entities/items/{item_id}/statements/{statement_id}` and `/entities/properties/{property_id}/statements/{statement_id}`

patch.summary: Change elements of a single Statement
patch.description: This endpoint is also accessible through `/entities/items/{item_id}/statements/{statement_id}` and `/entities/properties/{property_id}/statements/{statement_id}`

delete.description: This endpoint is also accessible through `/entities/items/{item_id}/statements/{statement_id}` and `/entities/properties/{property_id}/statements/{statement_id}`

ItemId.name: item_id
ItemId.description: The ID of the required Item

PropertyId.name: property_id
PropertyId.description: The ID of the required Property

StatementId.name: statement_id
StatementId.description: The ID of the required Statement

ItemStatementId.name: statement_id
ItemStatementId.description: The ID of the required Item Statement

PropertyStatementId.name: statement_id
PropertyStatementId.description: The ID of the required Property Statement

SiteId.name: site_id
SiteId.description: The ID of the required Site

ItemFields.name: _fields
ItemFields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in each response object.

PropertyFields.name: _fields
PropertyFields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in each response object.

PropertyFilter.name: property
PropertyFilter.description: Single property ID to filter statements by.

IfNoneMatch.name: If-None-Match
IfNoneMatch.description: Conditionally perform the request only if the resource has been modified since the specified entity revision numbers

IfModifiedSince.name: If-Modified-Since
IfModifiedSince.description: Conditionally perform the request only if the resource has been modified after the specified date

IfMatch.name: If-Match
IfMatch.description: Conditionally perform the request only if the resource has not been modified since one of the specified entity revision numbers

IfUnmodifiedSince.name: If-Unmodified-Since
IfUnmodifiedSince.description: Conditionally perform the request only if the resource has not been modified after the specified date

Authorization.name: Authorization
Authorization.description: Make authenticated request using a provided bearer token

Item.description: Payload containing a Wikibase Item and edit metadata

patch.description: A JSON Patch document as defined by RFC 6902

path.description: A JSON Pointer for the property to manipulate

value.description: The value to be used within the operation

Label.description: Payload containing a Wikibase label in the specified language and edit metadata

LabelsPatch.description: Payload containing a JSON Patch document to be applied to Labels and edit metadata

Aliases.description: Payload containing a list of Wikibase aliases in the specified language and edit metadata

AliasesPatch.description: Payload containing a JSON Patch document to be applied to an Item's aliases and edit metadata

Description.description: Payload containing a Wikibase description in the specified language and edit metadata

Statement.description: Payload containing a Wikibase Statement object and edit metadata

StatementPatch.description: Payload containing a JSON Patch document to be applied to a Statement and edit metadata

Sitelink.description: Payload containing a Wikibase Sitelink object and edit metadata

Statement.description: A single Wikibase Statement. Please note that the value of the `ETag` header field refers to the entity's revision ID.

X-Authenticated-User.description: Optional username of the user making the request

ItemStatement.description: A single Wikibase Statement. Please note that the value of the `ETag` header field refers to the Item's revision ID.

X-Authenticated-User.description: Optional username of the user making the request

PropertyStatement.description: A single Wikibase Statement. Please note that the value of the `ETag` header field refers to the Property's Revision ID.

X-Authenticated-User.description: Optional username of the user making the request

ItemStatementCreated.description: A single newly created Wikibase Statement. Please note that the value of the `ETag` header field refers to the entity's revision ID.

X-Authenticated-User.description: Optional username of the user making the request

Location.description: The URI of the newly created statement

PropertyStatementCreated.description: A single newly created Wikibase Statement. Please note that the value of the `ETag` header field refers to the entity's revision ID.

X-Authenticated-User.description: Optional username of the user making the request

Location.description: The URI of the newly created statement

X-Authenticated-User.description: Optional username of the user making the request
Optional username of the user making the request

NotModified.description: The specified resource has not been modified since last provided revision number or date

Moved.description: The specified resource has permanently moved to the indicated location

Location.description: The URL to which the requested resource has been moved

example.en: English science fiction writer and humourist
example.fr: crivain de science-fiction et humoriste anglais

example.en: that class of which this subject is a particular example and member; different from P279 (subclass of); for example: K2 is an instance of mountain; volcano is a subclass of mountain (and an instance of volcanic landform)
example.fr: cet lment est un exemple spcifique de cette classe qui en prcise la nature. Ne pas confondre avec la proprit P279 (sous-classe de)

id.description: The globally unique identifier for this Statement

data_type.description: The data type of the Property

content.description: The value, if type == "value", otherwise omitted
